SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: UPDATE b_appointment_consultation SET AC_ID=@@AC_ID@@% <%=,Company=@@Company@@%>,<%=,Contacts=@@Contacts@@%>,<%=,Phone=@@Phone@@%>,<%=,Email=@@Email@@%>,<%=,Matter=@@Matter@@%>,<%=,Material=@@Material@@%>,<%=,AC_Status=@@AC_Status@@%>,<%=,Processing_Result=@@Processing_Result@@%>,<%=,Create_Time=@@Create_Time@@%>,<%=,Create_UserId=@@Create_UserId@@%>,<%=,Create_User=@@Create_User@@%>,<%=,Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@%>,<%=,Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@%>,<%=,Update_User=@@Update_User@@%> WHERE AC_ID=@@AC_ID@@%;

SELECT AC_ID,Company,Contacts,Phone,Email,Matter,Material,AC_Status,Processing_Result,Create_Time,Create_UserId,Create_User,Update_Time,Update_UserId,Update_User FROM b_appointment_consultation WHERE 1=1 <%= AND AC_ID=@@AC_ID@@%> <%= AND Company=@@Company@@%> <%= AND Contacts=@@Contacts@@%> <%= AND Phone=@@Phone@@%> <%= AND Email=@@Email@@%> <%= AND Matter=@@Matter@@%> <%= AND Material=@@Material@@%> <%= AND AC_Status=@@AC_Status@@%> <%= AND Processing_Result=@@Processing_Result@@%> <%= AND Create_Time=@@Create_Time@@%> <%= AND Create_UserId=@@Create_UserId@@%> <%= AND Create_User=@@Create_User@@%> <%= AND Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@%> <%= AND Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@%> <%= AND Update_User=@@Update_User@@%>;

SELECT AC_ID,Company,Contacts,Phone,Email,Matter,Material,AC_Status,Processing_Result,Create_Time,Create_UserId,Create_User,Update_Time,Update_UserId,Update_User FROM b_appointment_consultation WHERE 1=1 <%= AND AC_ID=@@AC_ID@@%> <%= AND Company=@@Company@@%> <%= AND Contacts=@@Contacts@@%> <%= AND Phone=@@Phone@@%> <%= AND Email=@@Email@@%> <%= AND Matter=@@Matter@@%> <%= AND Material=@@Material@@%> <%= AND AC_Status=@@AC_Status@@%> <%= AND Processing_Result=@@Processing_Result@@%> <%= AND Create_Time=@@Create_Time@@%> <%= AND Create_UserId=@@Create_UserId@@%> <%= AND Create_User=@@Create_User@@%> <%= AND Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@%> <%= AND Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@%> <%= AND Update_User=@@Update_User@@%> <R%= LIMIT @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM b_appointment_consultation WHERE 1=1 <%= AND AC_ID=@@AC_ID@@%> <%= AND Company=@@Company@@%> <%= AND Contacts=@@Contacts@@%> <%= AND Phone=@@Phone@@%> <%= AND Email=@@Email@@%> <%= AND Matter=@@Matter@@%> <%= AND Material=@@Material@@%> <%= AND AC_Status=@@AC_Status@@%> <%= AND Processing_Result=@@Processing_Result@@%> <%= AND Create_Time=@@Create_Time@@%> <%= AND Create_UserId=@@Create_UserId@@%> <%= AND Create_User=@@Create_User@@%> <%= AND Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@%> <%= AND Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@%> <%= AND Update_User=@@Update_User@@%>;
